evaluations.opinion: The rise of the term â€˜rage baitâ€™ reflects a deeper shift in how attention, engagement, and online ethics are discussed.

confirmed_facts: Oxford University selected â€˜rage baitâ€™ as the 2025 Word of the Year.
The termâ€™s usage increased threefold over the previous 12 months.
The selection was based on a threeâ€‘day voting period involving over 30,000 participants.
The announcement was made on 30 December 2025 (local time).
â€˜Rage baitâ€™ is defined as content intentionally designed to provoke anger or outrage for traffic or engagement.
